summary: This document is a bargain and sale deed involving the transfer of property located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, which sold the property to Maple, Inc., a corporation based in the U.S. Virgin Islands, for a nominal sum of ten dollars.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, which is the grantor in the property transaction.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika Kellerhals is mentioned as the return address for the document, indicating her involvement in the legal aspects of the property transaction.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, indicating a direct leadership role.
Nine East 71st Street Corporation sold the property to Maple, Inc., indicating a financial transaction.

events.title: Property Transfer
events.description: The property located at 9 East 71st Street was transferred from Nine East 71st Street Corporation to Maple, Inc.

locations: 9100 Havensight Port of Sale, Suite 15-16, St. Thomas, VI 00802
keyFacts: The property at 9 East 71st Street was sold for a nominal amount of ten dollars.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation.
The buyer of the property is Maple, Inc., a corporation based in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
The document includes notarized acknowledgments of Epstein's execution of the deed.
The transaction is recorded in the Office of the City Register of the City of New York.
